examples.example: 美味的午餐让我充满了能量，开启了美好的下午时光。

translate.english: The delicious lunch makes me full of energy and starts the wonderful afternoon time.

examples.example: 我和朋友们享用了一顿丰盛的午餐，大家都很开心。

translate.english: I and my friends enjoyed a sumptuous lunch and everyone was very happy.

examples.example: 午餐时间和家人一起分享美食，真是一件幸福的事情。

translate.english: Sharing delicious food with family during lunch time is really a happy thing.
